An Analysis Of Smoking Cessation

Using Generalised Linear Models

Published on January 15, 2022

•

18 minutes

•

3729 words

Context: As part of my Generalised Linear Models module, I worked in a group of 5 to produce a project analysing the factors that contributed to smoking - using a fictional dataset. We achieved a grade of 95% on this report. All analysis in this project was conducted using R.

Download Report
